vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δόκῐμ-ος, ον
(Doric dialect α, ον [Refs], (δέχομαι) acceptable: hence,
__1 of persons, trustworthy, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; approved, esteemed, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; δοκιμώτατος Ἑλλάδι most approved by Hellas, her noblest son, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with infinitive, of approved ability to do.., δόκιμος δ᾽ οὔτις.. εἴργειν [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 of things, excellent, τὸ ἔαρ -ώτατον [Refs 5th c.BC+]; notable, considerable, ποταμός [Refs]; approved, κριθὰ καθαρὰ δ. [Refs]; δ. ἀργύριον legal tender, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ὕμνος acceptable, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__3 adverb -μως really, genuinely, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
approved by testing, genuine
proved, tried; approved, after examination and trial, Rom. 16:10; Jas. 1:12; by implication acceptable, Rom. 14:18
vocabInfos._es_Definition: aprobado, confirmado, genuino, auténtico ;  respetado; estimado ; haber pasado la prueba (SAN.1:12) ;
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 認可的, 經過驗證的, 純正的
2) 看重的, 敬重的 (羅 14:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 认可的, 经过验证的, 纯正的
2) 看重的, 敬重的 (罗 14:18)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đáng công nhận; chấp thuận; thử luyện
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Gloss: 蒙悅納, 所稱許, 試驗
vocabInfos._zh_Gloss: 蒙悦纳, 所称许, 试验
